title: Software Development
alt: Update: It turns out the cannon has a motorized base, and can make holes just fine using the barrel itself as a battering ram. But due to design constraints it won't work without a projectile loaded in, so we still need those drills.
transcript:
[Cueball and Hairy are standing together and Hairy holds a power tool in his hands.]
Cueball: We need to make 500 holes in that wall, so I've built this automatic drill. It uses elegant precision gears to continually adjust its torque and speed as needed.
Hairy: Great, it's the perfect weight! We'll load 500 of them into the cannon we made and shoot them at the wall.[Caption below the frame:]
How software development works
